threshold_description: Fixed 2.0 vol-point convergence spread threshold for Phase-0 sanity test. Not used in Phase-1 or production.
description: VRP-Convergence Phase-0 signal test (SHORT-ONLY): Short VX1 when (VIX - VX1) < -2.0, else flat. Positive spreads do NOT imply mean reversion.
rationale: Negative spread (VX1 > VIX) indicates VX1 too rich vs spot, expect convergence down. Positive spreads indicate momentum/expansion, not mean-reverting.
